body:
@jhorst The Pi intended for people learning programming and hardware, and I believe Go is a good language for learning computers. 

This is probably not the place for this discussion though. You can reach me at [gopher@nathany.com](mailto:gopher@nathany.com) if you like, or we can chat on the [forum](https://forum.golangbridge.org/) or [mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/golang-nuts).
